text: Eric Butorac and Scott Lipsky were the defending champions, but Butorac retired from professional tennis in September 2016 and Lipsky chose to compete in Istanbul instead. Ryan Harrison and Michael Venus won the title, defeating David Marrero and Tommy Robredo in the final, 7–5, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw Doubles
title: 2017 Estoril Open – Doubles
